title: Who is Isaac del Toro? UAE Mexican Prodigy Just Might Win this Giro d’Italia
content:
Isaac del Toro is the first Mexican to wear pink at the Giro. At just 21, the UAE rider is one of the brightest young stars in pro cycling.

Read the full article at Who is Isaac del Toro? UAE Mexican Prodigy Just Might Win this Giro d’Italia on Velo.
